# â¤ï¸ HeartBoostML

A machine learning project for **heart disease prediction** using advanced **boosting algorithms**, feature scaling, and **dimensionality reduction (PCA)**.  
Designed for **industry-grade ML workflows**, focusing on **accuracy, generalization, and reproducibility**.

---

## ğŸš€ Project Overview

Heart disease is one of the leading causes of mortality worldwide.  
This project builds a **robust predictive model** using **ensemble boosting techniques** to accurately classify patients at risk of heart disease.

---

## ğŸ¯ Project Objectives

- Predict the likelihood of heart disease in patients
- Compare multiple boosting algorithms for best performance
- Apply **feature scaling** and **PCA** for optimized preprocessing
- Perform **hyperparameter tuning** for model efficiency
- Build a reproducible ML pipeline for research and industry applications

## ğŸ§ª Data Preprocessing

### ğŸ” Optimization Technique
